title: dEvI brOva
sahitya:
dEvI brOva samayamidE ati vEgamE vacci


anupallavi

  nA vetalu dIrci karuNincavE shankari kAmAkSI


caraNam 1    lOka jananI nApai dayalEdA (mAyammA) nI dAsuDu gadA shrI kAnci vihAriNi kalyANI 
EkAmrEshvaruni priya bhAmayaiyunna nIkEmammAyantO bhAramA vinumA nAtalli
    caraNam 2    rEpu mA pani ceppitE nE vinanu (dEvI) ika tALanu nEnu I proddu daya cEyavE krpa 
jUDavE nI padAbjamulE madilO sadA enci nI prApu kOriyunnAnammA mudamutO mA tallI
    caraNam 3    shyAmakrSNa sOdarI kaumArI (shankarI) bimbAdharI gaurI hEmAcalajE lalitE paradEvatE
kAmAkSi ninnuvinA bhuvilO prEmatO kApADevarunnArammA vinumA mA tallI
